channel.title: How to make an item 2 handed [PI]
channel.description: What i mean by 2 handed is where you cant wear a shield with like a chaotic maul or a primal maul. Right now you're able to wear a left handed item with a primal maul, and id like to make it so it unequips the left hand item when you put the maul on.

item.title: How to make an item 2 handed [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

I COULD be wrong, but I believe it has something to do with this under itemassistant.java

public boolean is2handed(String itemName, int itemId) { look under that and see what you can come up with.

You can reach itemassistant.java from server->src-> server -> models-> items ->itemassistant.java

Read full topic
item.source: How to make an item 2 handed [PI]
